summary: A heart-racing documentary portrait of Carl Boenish, the father of the BASE jumping movement, whose early passion for skydiving led him to ever more spectacular -and dangerous- feats of foot-launched human flight.

keywords: human flight|base jumping|male female relationship|f rated|extreme sport
title: Sunshine Superman
